abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Presenting trios by Beethoven and Kodaly and the “American” quintet by Dvorak, the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center offered a Sunday afternoon of exceptional playing.
snippet: Presenting trios by Beethoven and Kodaly and the “American” quintet by Dvorak, the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center offered a Sunday afternoon of exceptional playing.
